question: What is the theme of the 2018 International Literacy Day (ILD)?
option3: Reading the Past, Writing the Future
explanation: The International Literacy Day (ILD) is celebrated every year on 8 September to highlight the importance of literacy to individuals, communities and societies. The 2018 theme \"Literacy and skills development\" explores and highlights integrated approaches that simultaneously can support the development of literacy and skills, to ultimately improve peopleâ€™s life and work and contribute to equitable and sustainable societies.
